description: This file defines the LessonPlayer React component responsible for rendering a lesson page within an e-learning platform. It manages navigation between lessons, displays lesson content, and allows marking lessons as completed, with state persisted in local storage.

methods.name: LessonPlayer()
methods.description: Main React component rendering a lesson page with navigation and completion controls.

methods.name: markDone
methods.description: Marks the current lesson as completed, persisting in local storage.

methods.name: goPrev
methods.description: Navigates to the previous lesson if it exists.

methods.name: goNext
methods.description: Navigates to the next lesson if it exists.
